Articles.Content:
Looking for people to have a space race. My current thoughts are getting two teams of 2 or 3 people on skype and each member of the team have different tasks such as :

  • Recovering Spacecraft
  • Atmospheric Flight Operations
  • Interplanetary Ops
  • Near Kerbin Ops
  • Spacecraft Development
  • Tech Development ( Adding Mods based on budget and research )

  • It may be done through sharing save files and done by " passing the baton " and the tasks above or having tasks be put into steps like :
    1. Tech Dev ( Finding mods within constraints or improving stock parts )
    2. Craft Design ( Designing Crafts )
    3. Mission Control ( Mission Control Handled by all available team members )

    If interested search skype for quethepilot or just respond here

Edited July 3, 2013 by QueThePilot

Hey, I would be up for a possible space race. Have any more info on how you want to do it? I think sharing screenies of challenges would be a good way to go on meeting criteria. Sounds like a fun thing for a weekend. Not quite a challenge and might be better in general, but the idea of live issued challenges is cool!
I would, but my computer's too slow and I don't have a webcam.
This looks like it could be a cool game, good luck getting interested players
Sign me up. I'm itching to try some of my Ghost Aerospace crafts on real missions.
